scripts.build: npm run copy:libs && npm run bundle
scripts.copy:libs: mkdir -p lib && cp node_modules/tom-select/dist/js/tom-select.complete.min.js lib/tom-select.complete.min.js && cp node_modules/tom-select/dist/css/tom-select.css lib/tom-select.css
scripts.bundle: npm run bundle:content && npm run bundle:background && npm run bundle:popup && npm run bundle:options
scripts.watch: npm run copy:libs && concurrently "npm run watch:content" "npm run watch:background" "npm run watch:popup" "npm run watch:options"
